headline: Assessing the Valuation of American Express (AXP) Following Recent Share Price Gains
summary: American Express (AXP) shares inched up recently, as investors continue to assess the company’s performance and market trends. The stock has posted steady gains, climbing 17% over the past month and 24% in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for American Express. American Express's share price has seen a strong run lately, with momentum clearly building after recent gains. The stock boasts a 23.5% year-to-date return, and its 1-year total shareholder return stands at an impressive...
